thread.title: 3D Systems Earnings Show Ongoing 3-D Printer Struggle
thread.title_full: 3D Systems Earnings Show Ongoing 3-D Printer Struggle

title: 3D Systems Earnings Show Ongoing 3-D Printer Struggle
text:
3D Systems Earnings Coming During Market Turbulence 
Amid troubled times in the 3-D printer business, 3D Systems (NYSE:DDD) is expected to report a big drop in second-quarter earnings before the market open Thursday. The consensus estimate is revenue of $173.2 million, up 14% from the year-earlier quarter. The consensus on earnings per share minus ... 08/05/2015 08:02 AM ET Stratasys Upgraded; TransUnion, Milacron Initiated 
Stratasys (NASDAQ:SSYS) was upgraded on Tuesday, a day after rival 3D Systems' (NYSE:DDD) price target was lowered. JPMorgan upgraded Stratasys to overweight. Last week, the 3-D printer maker gave light guidance. On Monday, Needham lowered 3D Systems' price target to 22 from 28. Stratasys shares ... 08/04/2015 04:28 PM ET Disney Price Target Raised, 3D Systems' Lowered 
Entertainment conglomerate Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) and hard drive maker Seagate Tech (NASDAQ:STX) were among companies receiving price target upgrades Monday. Disney's price target was raised to 130 from 120 by RBC Capital Markets. Shares closed up 0.9% to 121.12 on the stock market today. RBC also ... 08/03/2015 04:42 PM ET Stratasys Gets Upgrade On Long-Term 3-D Printer Hope 
With its stock trading at a 3.5-year low, 3-D printer maker Stratasys (NASDAQ:SSYS) received a rare upgrade Friday. Piper Jaffray analyst Troy Jensen upgraded Stratasys to overweight from neutral, though he also lowered his price target on Stratasys stock to 39 from 42. Stratasys stock was down ... 07/31/2015 03:17 PM ET Stratasys Warns, Pulls Guidance For 3D Printer Maker 
Continuing to show hard times in the 3D printer market, Stratasys (NASDAQ:SSYS) withdrew its full-year guidance after reporting second quarter earnings Thursday morning. Stratasys reported Q2 revenue of $182.3 million, up 2% from the same quarter a year ago. That was its slowest growth in years, ... 07/30/2015 12:25 PM ET Facebook's Instagram On A Roll, Thanks To Ads: Report 
Facebook (NASDAQ:FB)-owned photo sharing site Instagram will post $600 million in revenue this year as the site carries more ads, according to a report Thursday by research group eMarketer. And Instagram's ad revenue will reach $2.81 billion in 2017, thanks to a new direct-response button and ... 01:15 PM ET Fitbit limping on gross margin concerns 
Fitbit (NYSE:FIT) could use a spotter. The maker of wearable activity trackers saw its shares tumble Thursday, a day after the company reported a second-quarter earnings beat that prompted several analysts to raise their price targets. Fitbit stock was down 14.5% in midday trading on the stock ... 01:08 PM ET SunEdison Misses Q2 Forecast, Hits Six-Month Low 
SunEdison (NYSE:SUNE) stock hit a seven-month low Thursday after the solar panel manufacturer posted a bigger Q2 loss than Wall Street had forecast. In Q2, SunEdison had revenue of $455 million and per-share losses of 93 cents. Its yieldco, TerraForm (NASDAQ:TERP), accounted for $130 million of ... 12:58 PM ET Hortonworks Gaps Up On Hadoop 'Disruption' 
Hortonworks (NASDAQ:HDP) stock surged Thursday after the Hadoop developer's earnings from the day before easily topped Wall Street forecasts. Shares of the open-source Hadoop database pioneer gapped up as much as 19% Thursday, touching a seven-month high of 28.71. Hortonworks stock was up 18% in ... 12:54 PM ET These Two Biotechs Boast Big EPS Growth Rates 
IBD's Medical-Biomed/Biotech group holds the No. 1 spot on the list of 197 industry groups tracked, as several of its members topped Street forecasts over the past week. Today's Screen of the Day focuses on Top Fundamentals, stocks with three-year earnings and revenue growth rates of 25% or more. ... 12:40 PM ET
